title: New from SIAS: Reinstaedt
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Reinstaedtposter_2bb_5938.jpg)

Reinstaedt is a new typeface family by Andreas Stötzner.  
You can overlay a choice of the fonts and easily create fancy colour and tint variations. A set of Ornaments and Initial embellishments add to the joy of using it …

NOTE!: the 20%-off introductory sale ends on June 8 !

[Reinstaedt at Myfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/reinstaedt/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rst_celebration_3767.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rst_landmarkt_3452.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rst_maelzer_3845.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rst_fgh_5775.jpg)
author: Andreas Stötzner
